mapper.select: SELECT id, USRID as usrId, stock_code as stockCode, trade_date as tradeDate, quantity, price, created_at as createdAt FROM trade_history WHERE USRID = #{usrId} AND stock_code = #{stockCode} ORDER BY trade_date DESC, created_at DESC
SELECT id, USRID as usrId, stock_code as stockCode, trade_date as tradeDate, quantity, price, created_at as createdAt FROM trade_history WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trade_history (USRID, stock_code, trade_date, quantity, price) VALUES (#{usrId}, #{stockCode}, #{tradeDate}, #{quantity}, #{price})
